channel.title: The Site
channel.description: Post anything you want to say about our site, such as suggestions, comments, opinions, etc.

item.title: Is this forum dead?
item.author: invalid@example.com (XepptizZ)
item.dc:creator: XepptizZ
item.content:encoded:
Like I hardly see any living soul here. Just wondering what's the haps on this forum.

Also, are there any moderators even around here? Or can I just spam at will?

item.title: Mod/Mut Announcements?
item.author: invalid@example.com (SuperApe)
item.dc:creator: SuperApe
item.content:encoded:
I'm looking everywhere on BUF and I see plenty of work-in-progress subforums, including those here on ModSquad. I see lots of "This Site" and "Miscellaneous" subforums. There's some "Comment on Games/Reviews/etc". But there isn't a place to announce finished Mods or Muts.

Am I missing something? Should I just move along to the next site?

item.title: Advertising spam in the user comments
item.author: invalid@example.com (DaBeowulf)
item.dc:creator: DaBeowulf
item.content:encoded:
Take a look at Marathon Rampancy's review for example.
BAN hammer and FBI ***!

item.title: !!!!WHY!!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Devera)
item.dc:creator: Devera
item.content:encoded: why is the been thing still at the front page is the thing ever refreshed it was the same last year....... don't get me wrong it was sortov funny the first time i saw it but now it is just boring

item.title: needing help
item.author: invalid@example.com (goldeneagle)
item.dc:creator: goldeneagle
item.content:encoded: I'm new here..was looking for help on how this site works...I was trying to upload a sig pic,but didn't know how for sure would someone help,please...thanks

item.title: Weird stuff goin on.
item.author: invalid@example.com (XepptizZ)
item.dc:creator: XepptizZ
item.content:encoded:
Whenever I go to www.planetunreal.com\modsquad I get a UT only modsquad site with stil hamtaro in the new section. Shouldn't that thing be closed or sumthin? Also, I can do to these forums via the link, but via the link on the forums, I get to the "new?" site.

Also, on the "New?" site I can't seem to find the darn search option, hehe.

Also, how would I upload a mod? Or make it avail on the site?

item.title: New mod, map, mutator review site in need of reviewers
item.author: invalid@example.com (Prelithe)
item.dc:creator: Prelithe
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

I've already posted this on the beyondunreal forums, but i hope some people who are into this site may be interested in starting up a new review site. I would happily like to revive this site if possible, because it would save time instead of me finding/coding php scripts and such, although i will change things such as the site.

If anyone is interested in reviewing Mods, Maps, mutators etc, please don't hesitate to post here

Thank You
Prelithe

item.title: Echo...
item.author: invalid@example.com (LDataKiller)
item.dc:creator: LDataKiller
item.content:encoded:
The Modsquad site is silent, where is everybody?
No news since 2002? no new mods? mewts? nothing.
Whats going on?

I visited this site just before the last post, i come back in a few years and all is silent... somebody please explain.

item.title: Multi jumping
item.author: invalid@example.com (thepostman)
item.dc:creator: thepostman
item.content:encoded: Is there a mod that lets you teleport more then one or two times with out hurting your health ableing you to get up large buildings and such without having to us matrix or run low gravity????????like Multi jumping while teleporting is the best way to discrible what my thoughts are!IN UT99 ty!

item.title: Matches
item.author: invalid@example.com (-=[mSn]=-Yawner)
item.dc:creator: -=[mSn]=-Yawner
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys you know when u play a clan match and theres a point where u need to make ppl switch teams... and the darn server wont let you... is there a mutator/mod that will allow the server admin to change the teams of the players???

Cheers Yawner... and Team -=[mSn]=-

item.title: OK...LET'S DO IT!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bean 3:16)
item.dc:creator: Bean 3:16
item.content:encoded:
I think it is that time again. I'm gonna try to get it going. I'll start with MSC posts again, and then...I dunno after that. But we will do this. I'll e-mail and PM those who I think can do stuff, and I'll see if I can't get some more help. But getting help will wait. First, I will just review...I will review until the cows come home dammit.

Boom, it's on, bitch n***a we'll rock yo room!
Boom, bitch, what's happenin?

item.title: Summer = updates?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Gabbo5)
item.dc:creator: Gabbo5
item.content:encoded: Since summer has begun, are we going to see more updates, or the staleness as per usual? Lots of new mods out there, just wating to be reviewed

item.title: MODSQUAD = SH!T

item.dc:creator: tdwkillgasm
item.content:encoded: THIS SITE IS USELESS! it hasnt even been updated since the release of UT2k4, y is beyondunreal still even hosting it!?!?!?

item.title: The spam thread
item.author: invalid@example.com (Nemephosis)
item.dc:creator: Nemephosis
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, it's spam. You know what spam is, so lets get to it.

Why? I don't know, something to do around here.

Only a couple rules: don't post pure spam like MILK SPONGE CHEESE, make it english, and don't double or triple post etc. That's about it.

So, I like cookies.

item.title: Rockets UT 1.1 (for UT99)
item.author: invalid@example.com (difool2)
item.dc:creator: difool2
item.content:encoded:
I loved the 1.0 version, so decided to DL 1.1 when I was surfing and lucked
onto the homesite. Too bad it is no longer being worked on, as it has a
couple of serious bugs (I'm using Windows XP Pro, BTW):

1. The turrets don't work at all, and

2. There is a "freeze" bug which causes player pawns (bots and humans)
to freeze in place. At first I thought it was a new kind of rocket (a la the
various "freeze" guns we have seen), but you are basically locked in place
until someone...

Rockets UT 1.1 (for UT99)

item.title: forums

item.dc:creator: shawing
item.content:encoded: Hi I just wanted to say that ive noticed that these forums are really dead. Hardly any topics have had a reply in the last month except for maybe one or two. just wanted to say that..

item.title: Clean up links please...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rincewiend)
item.dc:creator: Rincewiend
item.content:encoded:
I've tried dl'ing mods and mutators but some are dead, sometimes even the creators site is dead(mixmaper for instance)...
Maybe you should just host all the stuff on BU as well, or at least the small stuff, just ask the people who made the mod/mutator if you can...

item.title: Mutators????

item.dc:creator: Master Roshi
item.content:encoded: Once you could get almost any Mutator here. Where did they all go I cannot find anything here anymore.....Can some one tell me where to find the Mutators that used to be here?.
